scripts.watch:css: inotifywait -m -r -e modify,create,delete ./src/scss/ | while read NEWFILE; do node-sass src/scss/app.scss website/css/app.css --output-style compressed; done
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:css" "jekyll build --watch --baseurl '' --source website" "firebase serve" "xdg-open http://127.0.0.1:5000/"
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production webpack --optimize-minimize --config webpack.config.js && node-sass src/scss/app.scss website/css/app.css --output-style compressed
